articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Chollima Steel Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Chollima Steel Complex
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex, lighting a torch for bringing about a fresh revolutionary surge.
					He was accompanied by Pak Nam Gi, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Thae Nam, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					He first went round the monument to the on-the-spot guidance provided by President Kim Il Sung standing in the compound of the complex and the room devoted to its history.
					
					He said that the complex associated with the President's history of the nation-building characterized by the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude experienced and bore witness to a great history showing the patriotic devotion of the President who dedicated his whole life to the building of a rich and powerful country and the might of the integral whole formed between the leader and the people.
					
					He highly praised the workers of the complex for their feats performed before the country and its people, the times and the revolution, noting that they have made a great contribution to the work for building an independent national economy and industrializing the country for a long period up to this date since the early period of building a new country, remaining true to the idea and guidance of the leader.
					
					He learned in detail about the construction and production at the complex, looking round the newly built UHP electric arc furnace and other places.
					
					He highly appreciated the distinguished services rendered by the officials, technicians and workers of the complex, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have successfully built the UHP electric arc furnace of Korean-style, which may be called the core of the steel industry, in the spirit of self-reliance in hearty response to the WPK's policy of attaching importance to science.
					
					He met with Ho In Hwan, one of the heads of the first Chollima work-teams in the period of the great Chollima upswing, Ri Jae Gyong who designed the above-said furnace and other officials, workers and technicians who have done a lot of things, working at the complex for years, and highly praised their patriotic spirit before having a photo taken with them.
					
					He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the complex to establish a steel production system based on Juche steel and ensure supply service, stressing that the steel industry is one of the most important fields in building an economic power.
					
					Only four years are left before opening the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation and there are many difficulties and trials to be weathered, he said, adding but the Korean people are sure to emerge victorious as long as they have inexhaustible creative power as they are armed with the spirit of self-reliance and have the powerful Juche-based industry equipped with new technology.
					
					Noting that the Korean people opened the gate of industrialization at one go by advancing several centuries in the spirit of self-reliance which stunned the world in the 1950s, he underscored the need to give full play to the might of self-reliance which was augmented in the days of "the Arduous March", the forced march and thus build a great prosperous powerful nation earlier than scheduled.
					
					He earnestly called on the entire party and army and all the people to bring about a new revolutionary surge with the conviction of sure victory and indomitable spirit and thus fling open the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation by 2012 and more strikingly demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Papers Call for More Vigorously Advancing along Road of Songun
articles.content:
Papers Call for More Vigorously Advancing along Road of Songun
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Leading papers today editorially observe the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the Supreme Commander enabled the Korean people to have the great honor of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and provided them with a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu with the might of Songun, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The history in which Kim Jong Il has led the Korean revolution, shouldering the heavy responsibility as the Supreme Commander, is an immortal heroic epic as he has firmly defended the sovereign dignity of the country and the nation by augmenting the country's military power in every way.
					
					It is a glorious history in which he set a shining example of the times in accomplishing the cause of socialism with original Songun politics and a history of noble patriotic devotion in which he has aroused all the people and servicepersons with profound comradely love and trust, ushering in a new era of prosperity of the country.
					
					Thanks to the invincible revolutionary armed forces which have grown to be a matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu under the care of the great Songun brilliant commander, the DPRK has always emerged victorious in the political, military and diplomatic stand-off with the U.S. imperialists and fully demonstrated the dignity of Kim Il Sung nation generation after generation.
					
					 The dignity of the country and the nation advancing with the might of Songun is firmly guaranteed.
					
					He formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and has embodied it in all fields. This is a historic event as it brought about a signal turn in accomplishing the cause of socialism. Thanks to the Songun politics the advantages and might of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses have been more strikingly demonstrated and the Korean people are proud of being a people vital with the spirit of socialism and a revolutionary people waging a dynamic struggle, regarding socialism as their life and soul and part of their life.
					
					 Epoch-making changes and shining successes that have taken place on this land over the past more than decade are the fruition of the ties of profound love and trust, the sense of repaying them and obligation and the great harmonious whole formed between Kim Jong Il and the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 His Songun idea and Songun politics serve as an ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution and the Korean people have a rosy future and they are sure to triumph as they are advancing along the road of Songun.
					
					Minju Joson calls upon all the people to more vigorously struggle for the prosperity of the DPRK under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and the New Year, Juche 98 (2009).
					The floral basket and the letter were conveyed to Pak Ui Chun, DPRK foreign minister, today by Noorullah Khan, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK who is the doyen of the corps.

articles.title: Great Songun Commander of Invincible Army
articles.content:
Great Songun Commander of Invincible Army
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean People's Army has grown into invincible revolutionary armed forces that any formidable enemy on earth dare not pounce upon.
					It is unthinkable apart from the extraordinary intelligence and energetic Songun revolutionary leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il.
					
					Over the last decades he has poured  all his heart and soul into the work of developing and strengthening the KPA into an invincible army.
					
					In particular, the past 10-odd years when the Songun politics has been embodied in an overall way were years of demonstrating his prominent commanding art and were recorded in the history of Juche-oriented army building as proud annals in which the KPA ushered in its heyday.
					
					When the country and the revolution  faced with grim trials due to the imperialist allied forces' reckless moves to invade and stifle them, he put forth the original idea that the army is immediately the Party, the state and the people, and formulated the Songun politics as the basic mode of the socialist politics.
					
					With his indefatigable army-inspection for Songun he has strengthened the KPA to be a matchless powerful army that can wipe out any imperialist aggressive forces at one stroke with the result that it has displayed its might as a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.
					
					During the period of the"Arduous March"  the KPA started the vigorous movement for winning the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment, a new higher form of mass movement, and waged a brisk campaign to follow the spiritual and moral traits of Hero Kil Yong Jo and other soldiers who defended the leader with their very lives, developing itself into a unit of pure ideology, ranks of human bullets and bombs, for safeguarding the leader at the cost of lives.
					
					In order to boost the combat capacity of the KPA onto a highest phase, he, with his prominent commanding art, has never ceased to inspect army units, letting the servicepersons have inexhaustible wisdom and courage.
					
					It is thanks to the clairvoyance of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu that these years all the companies have been trained as powerful combat ranks through the military drills intensified on a new higher level to increase the combat power of the whole army remarkably and all the commanding officers have grown to be able ones.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK have won one victory after another in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation and the DPRK demonstrated its might as a powerful military state with self-defensive war deterrent. It is, indeed, a historical miracle wrought by them under the guidance of
						Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA.

articles.title: Homage to Kim Jong Suk Paid
articles.content:
Homage to Kim Jong Suk Paid
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday, the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					 Seen before the bust was a wreath from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and working people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					Placed before the bust were wreaths, together with bouquets, in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units and educational, public health and press organs, the joint national organization of the Korean Children's Union and party and power organs, factories and farms in the city.
					
					Also floral baskets were laid before her statues in Kim Jong Suk County and Hoeryong City and at Kim Jong Suk Naval Academy and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy.
					
					On the same day, the Military Attaches Corps here visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong to lay a wreath before her bust there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Brilliant Life in Devotedly Defending Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Brilliant Life in Devotedly Defending Leader
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk devotedly defended the leader with the rifle of Mt. Paektu tightly held in her hands. Her imperishable feats are throwing brilliant rays on this land.
					 She lived and fought all her life as a lifeguard and escort, regarding it her lifelong duty to defend and guard President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically at the cost of her life.
					
					She guarded the President at the risk of her life by mercilessly mowing down enemy troops creeping up by stealth with their eyes on the Headquarters in the battle at the entrance to Dashahe in June Juche 29 (1940).
					
					She made herself a human fortress and shield in guarding his safety at critical moments in many battles such as the Fusong County Seat battle and the Hongqihe battle during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					With a steadfast spirit of devotedly defending the leader, she staunchly defended the revolutionary idea and line of the President in any place and at any time.
					
					A typical example is that she defended the idea and authority of the President by throwing herself into a do-or-die fight against a renegade to the revolution at the Qingfeng secret camp.
					
					She dried the President's wet clothes which she had washed with the warmth of her body in biting cold around 40 degrees Celsius below zero and devoted her all for his health under difficult conditions of fierce battles with the enemy. All these facts give emotional accounts of her noble spirit of devoted defence of the leader.
					
					In the days of the building of a new country, she paid special attention to the personal safety of the President, remaining a "guard member" and reared the guardsmen into reliable guard personnel.
					
					The noble life of Kim Jong Suk who devoted her all only for the President is deeply cherished in the mind of the army and people of Korea.

articles.title: Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of Culture Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Museum of Ministry of Culture Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children are visiting everyday the "Hall Devoted to the Revolutionary Activities of Comrade
					Kim Jong Suk" in the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of Culture on the occasion of her birth anniversary which falls on today.
					On display there are historic relics which bear witness to how devotedly anti-Japanese war hero
						Kim Jong Suk worked for building revolutionary and popular culture and arts in new Korea true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung till the last moments of her life from right after the liberation of the country.
					
					Tens of thousands of people visited there this year, too, an indication that the reverence for the peerlessly great woman is getting deeper with the flow of time.
					
					At least 700,000 people have visited the hall over the last more than a decade since its opening on the occasion of her 80th birth anniversary.

articles.title: Congratulations to Thai Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Thai Prime Minister
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il on Dec. 23 sent a congratulatory message to Abhisit Vejjajiva upon his assumption of office as Prime Minister of Thailand.
					The message sincerely wished him success in his work for the stability of the country and well-being of the friendly Thai people and expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would favorably grow stronger in the mutual interests in the future, too.

articles.title: Day of Victorious Cuban Revolution Marked
articles.content:
Day of Victorious Cuban Revolution Marked
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs arranged a reception on Tuesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the victory of revolution in Cuba.
					Present there on invitation were Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 Minister Pak Ui Chun and officials of the ministry were on hand.
					
					Pak Ui Chun in his speech noted that the Cuban revolutionaries led by Fidel Castro Ruz waged a heroic armed struggle to put an end to the pro-U.S. dictatorial rule and build a genuine people's country, a socialist system.
					
					Over the past 50 years after the victory of the revolution the Cuban government and people have honorably defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and made great progress in the work to develop the economy, improve the people's livelihood and strengthen the defence capabilities, he said, stressing: We will as ever strive to steadily boost the traditional and comradely relations of friendship and cooperation between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					Jose Manuel Galego Montano said in his speech that the Cuban party and people would strengthen cooperation with the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people led by General Secretary 
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					We are happy to celebrate the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the ambassador said, wishing the heroic Korean people great success in the new year.

articles.title: Japan's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed
articles.content:
Japan's Solicitation Diplomacy Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- It is ridiculous of Japan to busy itself peddling the "abduction issue" as the main thrust of its diplomacy, pushing aside all its pending problems to settle.
					After refusing to fulfill its commitment under the October 3 agreement and laying a hurdle in the way of the six-party talks, Japan is going hectic with diplomacy over the "abduction issue" in a bid to achieve its sinister aim.
					
					The Aso Cabinet is making sheep's eyes at the Obama Administration expected to emerge soon, in anticipation of "cooperation" from it over the above-said issue.
					
					In the past Japan was so ridiculous as to visit this or that country to solicit "cooperation" and "support", insisting that north Korea should not be de-listed as "a state sponsor of terrorism" unless the "abduction issue is settled". But this diplomacy got it nowhere.
					
					Wretched is the plight of the Japanese politicians who are left with no option but to cling to such solicitation diplomacy over the "abduction issue" which no one sympathizes with.
					
					They would be well advised to properly understand the international community's reaction to it and their own difficult position if they have even an iota of reason.
					
					Those countries concerned have regarded Japan as a trouble maker as it raised the "abduction issue" irrelevant to the agenda of the talks, deliberately creating difficulties in their way.
					
					As Japan refused to honor its commitments under the agreement reached at the talks, other countries were chosen to participate in the undertaking to make economic compensation in place of that country. Japan thus suffered again the disgrace as a political pigmy in the eyes of the world.
					
					It is the outmoded way of thinking to try to settle anything by depending on others, far away from the universally accepted conception and understanding of the international community as regards a certain issue. Japan seems to forget the truth that this way of thinking no longer works at present.
					
					It is the public opinion that Japan lags behind, failing to keep pace with other countries in Northeast Asia in handling important matters in the region.
					
					The situation is bound to develop as required by the international justice and the developing reality regardless of whether Japan likes or not.
					
					Japan will gain nothing by using "the abduction issue" as a playing card at present.
					
					Japan is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can prevent the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula from finding its solution through hectic diplomacy over the "nuclear issue" and, furthermore, put spurs to the moves to convert Japan into a military giant under this pretext.
					
					Japan would be well advised not to peddle the outdated "abduction issue" but put under control its mayhem characterized by a scramble for power and properly repent of the hideous human rights abuses committed against the Korean people and make reparation for them, to begin with.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Military Expansion Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Ambition for Overseas Military Expansion Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The forces of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan railroaded the new "bill on special measures against terrorism" which calls for the extension of the refueling mission of the Maritime "Self-Defence Force" in the Indian Ocean by forcing re-voting on it, taking the advantage of their overwhelming majority in the House of Representatives. 
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The ulterior aim sought by the above-said reactionaries in ramming the above-said bill through the House of Representatives is to expand the sphere of the SDF's overseas military actions and realize their ambition for overseas military expansion by joining the U.S. and cooperating with it in the "anti-terror war" to the end.
					
					 By performing the overseas refueling mission for an indefinite period Japan seeks to lay a springboard from which to launch overseas aggression and start a war any time.
					
					The Air SDF of Japan recently staged a joint military exercise with the U.S. air force to put the above-said scenario into practice. The Japanese reactionaries are betraying their bellicose nature, firing missiles in far-off regions under the pretext of someone's non-existent "missile threat."
					
					 Japan's talk about "contribution to peace" is an artifice veiled with peace.  If Japan is truly concerned for ensuring peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world, it should halt the moves for overseas military expansion such as the dispatch of its combat forces abroad and the military operations there.
					
					 It is a trite method of Japan to invade other countries by mobilizing armed forces, trumpeting about "peace." Its method of aggression remains unchanged. It has become craftier and more vicious in that method. The Japanese reactionaries have become evermore undisguised in their moves for overseas aggression after building legal and institutional mechanisms for the overseas military activities of the SDF under the pretexts of "UN peace-keeping cooperation activities", "cooperation in anti-terror war" and others. They are going reckless, seized with the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					Japan is bound to meet an inescapable disaster any time, if it fails to face up to the reality of the changed world and continues running riot, blinded with the above-said ambition.

articles.title: Lee Group Accused of Tampering with History
articles.content:
Lee Group Accused of Tampering with History
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Lee Myung Bak group let the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology of south Korea distribute CDs what it called "history of miracles" in which it justified the fascist suppression committed by the successive dictatorial regimes including traitor Park Chung Hee.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary terms this action a despicable act of treachery to tamper with and stamp out the history of the south Korean people's just struggle for independently carving out their destiny and justify the dictatorial forces' treacherous acts at any cost. 
					
					The Lee group's desperate efforts to project itself, talking about what it called "history of miracles," are an intolerable mockery and insult to the south Korean people who have waged a sanguinary struggle for independence, democracy and reunification as it is nothing but an unpopular action of those who regard the people as no more than victims of its treacherous policy, riding roughshod over them, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The racket of tampering with history aimed at justifying the foreign forces' colonial domination, praising the erstwhile treacherous ruling quarters and inciting the hostility toward the DPRK is gaining in scope and strength in south Korea.
					
					It is as clear as noonday that the above-said row is a revelation of the fascist intention to tide over the extremely serious ruling crisis and arrest the people's patriotic struggle for independence, democracy and reunification by calming down the resentment of various circles in south Korea at the treacherous regime, turning all fabrics of society pro-American and conservative and ultra-right and reactionary and spread the venom of inter-Korean confrontation in them.
					
					With no desperate efforts to whitewash the traitors to the nation and distort history can the Lee group cover up the truth of history.
					
					Should the Lee group persist in its moves to tamper with history quite contrary to the trend of the times and the desire of the people it will not be able to escape a miserable doom.

articles.title: Implementation of June 15 and October 4 Declarations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of June 15 and October 4 Declarations Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on Dec. 20 at which it urged the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to have a proper approach towards the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, according to KBS of south Korea.
					A resolution read out at the meeting made it clear that the above-mentioned declarations serve as historic declarations provided by the south and the north for achieving reunification.
					
					The resolution urged the Lee "government" to take a proper stand to thoroughly implement the historic declarations for reunification and put the deteriorated inter-Korean relations on a right track. 
					
					The resolution demanded the Lee regime roll back its confrontational policy and implement the above-said declarations.

articles.title: Candlelight Action against Lee Myung Bak Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action against Lee Myung Bak Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A candlelight action against Lee Myung Bak was launched in Seoul on Dec. 21 on the theme of "Indefinite challenge" under the sponsorship of the Action Group to Prevent Lee Myung Bak from Enacting Evil Laws which are aimed at destroying the people's livelihood and democracy. The action group is made up of members of civic and public organizations and students.
					 Attending the action were members of civic and public organizations and political parties, including the Solidarity for Progress, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Democratic Labour Party, and citizens and students from Seoul, Chongju and many other areas, over 4,000 in all.
					
					 There was a rally at which indignation speeches were made.
					
					 Speakers called for checking the budget bill for 2009 which was railroaded by the "Grand National Party" and the Lee Myung Bak's evil laws with the strength of indefinite challenge. This challenge will last until Lee Myung Bak leaves "Chongwadae," they declared.
					
					After the rally the participants marched towards the "National Assembly" building in Youido till sunset.
					
					 In a resolution they declared a people's resistance movement against Lee Myung Bak's dictatorship and expressed the determination to wage a vigorous struggle to check Lee's evil laws and GNP's monopoly at the NA.
					
					 They stated that in the coming days they would hold such events as a meeting to vow the struggle against the passage of the "motion calling for ratification of south Korea-U.S. FTA" and the evil laws, an emergency action before the NA, relay-style press conferences and an "indefinite challenge at the end of the year".
					
					 On Dec. 20, members of over 20 civic and public and student organizations and political parties, including the Teachers' Union (Jongyojo), the Meeting of School Youth and Children and the Democratic Labour Party, and citizens, more than 1,500 all told staged a candlelight rally outside the building of the Seoul City Education Office in demand of reinstatement of the unreasonably discharged teachers of Jongyojo and repeal of the puppet government's wrong education policy.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by AAPSO
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by AAPSO
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th congress of the Afro－Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO) held in India between Dec. 14 and 16 with at least 400 delegates of 25 countries including the DPRK and international organizations extended full support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					 A special statement on Korea adopted at the congress said that the prevailing situation on the Korean Peninsula is arousing great concern of the international community.
					
					 It continued:
					
					The U.S. is still pursuing its hostile policy towards the DPRK and massively beefing up its naval and air forces in and around south Korea after reorganizing its forces in south Korea into rapid deployment forces for realizing its wild ambition for aggression to dominate the DPRK and its neighboring countries of Asia under the signboard of the "strategic flexibility".
					
					The right-wing ruling conservative forces of south Korea are totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, after adopting the service for the U.S. and confrontation with the DPRK as a policy. They are staging ceaseless U.S.-led large-scale joint military exercises after massively introducing up-to-date combat equipment from the U.S., advocating even "the theory of preemptive attack" on the DPRK.
					
					It is a key issue of ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of Asia to put an end to the military confrontation and remove the danger of war from the Korean Peninsula and achieve its reunification.
					
					The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and replace the ceasefire agreement by a peace agreement, halt its joint military maneuvers and arms build-up for aggression and dismantle its military bases in south Korea.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea should drop its policy of pursuing confrontation with the DPRK and opposing reunification and stop the crackdown upon the progressive pro-reunification patriotic forces.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Hanna" Published
articles.content:
Magazine "Paektu-Hanna" Published
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the December issue of its magazine "Paektu-Hanna."
					The magazine carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il being put on a red necktie by boys of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School.
					
					 Seen in it was an article titled "The great Comrade Kim Jong Il's idea of national independence" praising his outstanding Songun politics.
					
					 The article said that the future of the nation to be reunified and prosper depends on the Songun politics symbolic of the Korean people's sovereignty, dignity and honor and that an independent, peaceful and prosperous, reunified powerful nation would surely be built on the Korean Peninsula according to Kim Jong Il's idea of national independence.
					
					 The magazine also edited articles titled "With faith in sure victory and unshakable will" and "Great life dedicated to devotedly defending the leader" dealing with the immortal revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Given in the magazine was photo-illustrated news that members of organizations under the association are studying Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might."

articles.title: Periodicos capitalinos llaman a avanzar por camino del Songun
articles.content:
Periodicos capitalinos llaman a avanzar por camino del Songun
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos centrales publicaron hoy los editoriales dedicados al 17o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El nombramiento del Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del EPC dio al pueblo coreano el gran honor de contar de generacion en generacion con los excelentes lideres y la firme garantia de la coronacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu con el poderio del Songun (priorizacion militar), senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					La historia de la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion coreana en calidad de Comandante Supremo es la imborrable epopeya de defensa fidedigna de la dignidad soberana de la patria y la nacion mediante la consolidacion por todos los medios de las fuerzas militares del pais.
					
					Ademas, es la trayectoria gloriosa y de noble abnegacion patriotica en que creo el brillante ejemplo de la epoca en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista practicando la original politica de Songun  y abrio la nueva era de prosperidad de la patria movilizando a todos los militares y habitantes con calida camaraderia y confianza.
					
					Gracias a las invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, fortalecidas como ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu en el regazo del General Insigne del Songun, nuestra patria pudo salir siempre victoriosa en las batallas politica, militar y diplomatica frente a los imperialistas norteamericanos y exaltar de siglo en siglo la dignidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					Hoy dia, esta garantizada la dignidad de la patria y la nacion que avanzan con el poderio del Songun.
					
					La definicion de la politica de Songun como principal modo politico del socialismo y la plena materializacion de ella por el Dirigente constituyeron un evento historico que produjo un viraje trascendental en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista. En virtud de esta formula politica, la superioridad y el poderio del socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares fueron manifestados con mas vigor y el pueblo coreano pudo convertirse en el revolucionario con el espiritu socialista que lucha tenazmente considerando este modelo social como su vida.
					
					Los cambios seculares y sorprendentes exitos logrados por la patria durante mas de 10 anos ultimos son productos de las relaciones del cordial amor, la confianza, la voluntad de reciprocarlos y la obligacion moral, establecidos entre el Dirigente y el ejercito y el pueblo, y la gran unidad de cuerpo y alma entre si.
					
					La idea y la politica de Songun del Dirigente son la bandera victoriosa de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Por lo tanto, es muy prometedor el futuro de todos nosotros que avanzamos por el camino del Songun y es definitiva nuestra victoria.
					
					A su vez, el periodico Minju Joson exhorta a todos a luchar mas energicamente por la prosperidad de la RPDC siguiendo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Depositan ofrendas florales ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Depositan ofrendas florales ante el busto de Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 91 aniversario del natalicio de la heroina de lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk fueron depositadas el dia 24 ofrendas florales ante su busto en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong.
					Ante el busto estaba puesta la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion los cuadros del Partido, el Ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares en la capital.
					
					Fueron depositadas alli tambien las ofrendas y ramos de flores a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, el ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC, instituciones de la ensenanza, salud publica, prensa e informacion, organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea, organos del partido y el Poder, fabricas y granjas en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El mismo dia, fueron depositados tambien los cestos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce de la heroina erguidas en el distrito de Kim Jong Suk de la provincia de Ryanggang, la ciudad de Hoeryong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, la Academia Naval y la Escuela General de Oficiales que llevan el nombre de ella.
					
					Tambien, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares en Corea coloco el mismo dia una ofrenda floral ante el busto de ella en dicho Cementerio.

articles.title: MINREX ofrece banquete por efemeride cubana
articles.content:
MINREX ofrece banquete por efemeride cubana
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 23 un banquete.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					Tambien estuvieron presentes el canciller Pak Ui Chun y otros funcionarios del MINREX.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Pak dijo que los revolucionarios cubanos encabezados por Fidel Castro Ruz pusieron fin a la tirania proyanqui a traves de una heroica lucha armada y construyeron un verdadero pais del pueblo, el regimen socialista.
					
					Continuo que a lo largo de estos 50 anos desde el triunfo de la revolucion, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba defendieron honrosamente la soberania y la dignidad del pais y lograron un gran avance en las labores para el desarrollo economico, la mejora de la vida y el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional.
					
					Enfatizo que en el futuro tambien, se esforzara activamente por ampliar y desarrollar constantemente las tradicionales y camaraderiles relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					En su discurso, el embajador cubano subrayo que el partido y el pueblo de Cuba fortaleceran la cooperacion con el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano encabezados por el camarada Kim Jong Il.
					
					Dijo que esta complacido por la oportunidad de celebrar el XVII aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del EPC y deseo que el heroico pueblo coreano logre grandes exitos en el ano nuevo.

articles.title: ATCC comenta diplomacia mendigante de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC comenta diplomacia mendigante de Japon
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Resulta incomprensible que Japon siguiera poniendo en el centro de sus actividades el "problema del secuestro" antes de atender los asuntos internos que le van mal.
					Este pais isleno, que dificulto el avance de las conversaciones a 6 bandas rehusando el cumplimiento de su deber estipulado en el Acuerdo del 3 de Octubre, libra intensamente hasta ahora su diplomacia para ganar el apoyo en el problema del "secuestro"
					
					En particular, el gabinete de Aso esta adulando a la entrante administracion norteamericana de Obama en busca de la "cooperacion" en el referido asunto.
					
					En el pasado tambien, Japon habia mendigado la "cooperacion" y el "apoyo" enviando sus delegaciones a varios paises e insistiendo atrevida y tercamente en que no se debe eliminar a la RPDC de la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo" antes de que se resuelva el "problema del secuestro".
					
					Pero, al fin y al cabo, tuvo que pasar tremenda pena cuando se conocio la decision norteamericana de excluir a la RPDC de la lista mencionada.
					
					!Que pobrecitos son los politicos japoneses que recurren a la diplomacia mendigante cuestionando obstinadamente el "problema del secuestro" de que nadie tiene compasion!
					
					Si ellos tuvieran un poco de razon, les conviene que sepan bien la reaccion de la sociedad internacional en cuanto a ese problema.
					
					Hasta ahora, Japon ha sido un dolor de cabeza para los paises interesados porque se porto mal poniendo escollos artificiales en las conversaciones a 6 bandas con ese problema que no tiene nada que ver con la agenda de esta cita.
					
					Para colmo, al elegirse otro pais a cargo de realizar la remuneracion economica a la RPDC en sustitucion de Japon, este pais volvio a quedarse avergonzado a la vista de todo el mundo siendo calificado de politico mezquino.
					
					Japon no sabe todavia que no vale hoy ese caduco metodo de solucionar algo apoyandose en alguien y despreciando la vision y entendimiento generales de la sociedad internacional sobre los problemas dados.
					
					La opinion publica senala que "Japon esta atrasado en la gestion de los importantes problemas regionales sin poder coordinar sus acciones con los demas paises del Nordeste Asiatico".
					
					La situacion avanzara segun la justicia internacional y la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo aunque alguien lo quiera o no.
					
					Actualmente, no hay nada que podra conseguir Japon utilizando esa carta (problema del secuestro).
					
					Esta muy equivocado Japon que trata de seguir escandalizando ese tema para impedir la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y acelerar, tomandolo por pretexto, la conversion de si mismo en una potencia militar.
					
					En lugar de andar con ese destenido paquete del "secuestro", Japon debe poner en orden su propia casa convertida en el escenario de tumultuosa pugna por el poder y reflexionar, balancear e indemnizar correctamente sus crimenes antieticos de gran envergadura cometidos contra el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a Lee Myung Bak por tergiversar la historia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a Lee Myung Bak por tergiversar la historia
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea justifico las atrocidades de represion fascista cometidas en los anteriores "regimenes" dictatoriales, inclusive el del traidor Park Chung Hee, en la llamada "historia milagrosa" distribuida por conducto del "Ministerio de Educacion, Ciencia y Tecnica".
					Esto es un crimen antinacional para tergiversar y suprimir la historia de la justa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por la forja del destino de manera independiente y justificar a toda costa los sucios crimenes vendepatrias de los dictadores.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y continua:
					
					Al encomiar a sus compinches hablando de la supuesta "historia milagrosa", la banda de Lee, que considera a las masas populares como blanco de su politica traidora, comete una accion antipopular poniendose por encima de ellas.
					
					Esto resulta insoportable desprecio e insulto a los habitantes surcoreanos que lucharon derramando sangre por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					Ahora, adquiere mayor dimension y brutalidad en el Sur de Corea tal campana de tergiversacion de la historia para justificar la dominacion colonial de las fuerzas extranjeras, elogiar a los ex gobernantes traidores y fomentar la conciencia hostil a la RPDC. Evidentemente dicho, esta campana parte de la siniestra intencion fascista de salir de la extremada crisis de gobernacion y sofocar la lucha patriotica de los habitantes por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion calmando a los habitantes de distintos sectores descontentos del actual "poder" traidor, convirtiendo toda la sociedad segun el conservadurismo proyanqui y el ultraderechismo reaccionario y propagando en ella la idea de enfrentamiento con el Norte de Corea.
					
					Pero, por muy persistentes que fueran las maniobras de la horda de Lee para distorsionar la historia disimulando los defectos de los anteriores traidores, nunca podran ocultar la verdad de la historia.
					
					Si esta banda actua de esa manera desafiando a la corriente de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo, sera arruinada tragicamente.
